name: seeder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a machine or device for sowing seeds (= putting them in the ground): Farmers on tractors were pulling seeders and sprayers across their fields. See also
cloud seeder
More examplesFewer examplesAt the store you can choose from 7 tractors, 4 combine harvesters and over 20 tools like ploughs, seeders, and balers.For more than a quarter-acre you'll want to invest in a hand-pushed planter or garden seeder.As rice farmers in Northern California plant their flooded fields over the next couple of weeks, most will not use a tractor or a tiller or any kind of seeder. He refurbished a series of old tractors and built himself a precision seeder to sow vegetables.
